name: Drill Above
description:
Chase your love and collect coins as you drill through the obstacles towards your goal.

Controls:

  • Movement - arrow keys
  • Jump - Z
  • Drill (when available) - C

Tools used:

  • Aseprite
  • Bosca Ceoil
  • jsfxr
  • Audacity
  • Rust programming language
  • Custom engine

Credits:

@Nestral (aka Nertsal) - Programming, Level design, Sfx, Music

@ADIS1 - Art, Sfx
